NReco.VideoInfo (FFProbe wrapper)
---------------------------------
Visit https://www.nrecosite.com/video_info_net.aspx for the latest information (change log, examples etc)
API documentation: https://www.nrecosite.com/doc/NReco.VideoInfo/
Nuget packages:
    https://www.nuget.org/packages/NReco.VideoInfo  (.NET Framework, ffprobe.exe is included)
    https://www.nuget.org/packages/NReco.VideoInfo.LT  (only wrapper, can be used with .NET Core or Mono)
